thread.title: Ted Cruz Just Zodiac Killed Deadspin By Expertly Trolling Them On Twitter
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz Just Zodiac Killed Deadspin By Expertly Trolling Them On Twitter

author: paulsacca
title: Ted Cruz Just Zodiac Killed Deadspin By Expertly Trolling Them On Twitter
text:
Via Ted Cruz Twitter 

It all started with an innocent request by Deadspin asking for a photo of Ted Cruz playing basketball. The unusual plea stemmed from a Politico story which stated that Cruz started a weekly basketball game where he urged fellow colleagues to attend. 
Send us proof of Ted Cruz playing basketball https://t.co/MgGLnsscPf pic.twitter.com/mpxI5EBQkK 
— Deadspin (@Deadspin) January 23, 2017 

Then something incredible happened. The U.S. Senator from Texas became self-aware that he oddly resembles Grayson Allen (Ted Cruz also looks like a woman who appeared on Maury and Kevin from The Office ). 
Ted Cruz then savagely trolled Deadspin with this one blistering tweet. 
@Deadspin what do I win? pic.twitter.com/9XuRmmIkJS 
— Ted Cruz (@tedcruz) January 25, 2017 

And just like that, Ted blew up Deadspin with his Cruz missile. 
Left in shock, Deadspin could only muster this comeback. 
@tedcruz Go eat shit.
— Deadspin (@Deadspin) January 25, 2017 

Ted then brought down the basketball ring with this powerful follow-up dunk. 
@Deadspin pic.twitter.com/TMiDBco2TB 
— Ted Cruz (@tedcruz) January 25, 2017 

Who knew that Ted had memes? Ted probably should have used some memes when he was a candidate for the Republican nomination for President of the United States in the 2016 election. 
The Zodiac Killer strikes again. 

Cruz, who is not winning the “Most Beloved Person in the Universe” Award anytime soon, was heralded as winning the internet on this night. 
You can say whatever you want about Ted Cruz's politics, but he just ethered Deadspin. pic.twitter.com/Mlx1Tn0ZX2 
— Single Malt Fiend (@Singlemaltfiend) January 25, 2017 
lol @deadspin go home. you lost a likablity contest to Ted Cruz.
You're bad at this.
— David Rutz (@DavidRutz) January 25, 2017 
Deadspin just got pwned by Ted Cruz. Twice. pic.twitter.com/KmEk7X1y3e 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) January 25, 2017 
Official list of media entities that have ever been owned by both Peter Thiel and Ted Cruz:
1. Deadspin
— Sean Davis (@seanmdav) January 25, 2017 


Politics aside, everyone has to agree Ted Cruz is a Legend for this. #Savage pic.twitter.com/BQZTQtEzdl 
— Dylan (@DylansFreshTake) January 25, 2017 

The writer of the article, Ashley Feinberg, vehemently denies that she was owned. 
@adampash @tedcruz @Deadspin i didn’t get owned
— Ashley Feinberg (@ashleyfeinberg) January 25, 2017 

Others disagree. 
Ted Cruz owned Ashley Feinberg so hard that Salon will do an article accusing him of violating the 13th Amendment.
— neontaster (@neontaster) January 25, 2017 
That poor girl is forever going to be known as the sports blogger who got owned by Ted Cruz. Yikes.
— Jason C. (@CounterMoonbat) January 25, 2017
